item.title: How to fix this string?
item.dc:creator: @lemme_winks lemme_winks_
item.description:
@lemme_winks wrote:

c.IdentifyHerb(1,199,249,guam); //exp/delte/add/string

the fourth argument in that function method takes a string. either make a string object called guam or pass in a string literal.

Read full topic

item.title: How to fix this string?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Problem: guam cannot be resolved to a variable

Client Class:

public void IdentifyHerb(int exp, int delete, int add, String newHerb) {
		sM("You identify the herb as a " + newHerb + ".");
		deleteItem(delete, getItemSlot(delete), 1);
		addItem(add, 1);
		addSkillXP(exp, 5);
	}

IdentifyHerb Class

			case 199:
				if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000)
				return;
				c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
				c.IdentifyHerb(1,199,249,guam); //exp/delte/add/string
				break;
